citation: Proclamation under the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Heavy Vehicle National Law (Tasmania) Act 2013 fix 30 March 2015 as the day on which section 31 of that Act commences.

16 March 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

Minister for Infrastructure

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 25 March 2015

This proclamation is administered in the Department of State Growth.
